enrl_requirement:
Enrollment Requirements: Students who have previously taken CMN 380-7 are not eligible to retake the course.
Add Consent: Department Consent Required
title: SoC CMN 380-7-22 Junior Tutorial

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: A hands on class in building a skill set of how to effectively communicate what you need, identify what your actor needs and keep creative impulses flowing. Using scenes from contemporary texts, we will fill the role of actor and director to offer experiences replicating the rehearsal process. A portion of the class will involve observing rehearsals on campus, speaking with professional directors and surveying actors and directors for their biased input.

subject: CMN
